name: Pengo2
description:
Introduction

This is a rapid prototype made by MEAE Cohort9 students in two weeks.

A dungeon-based puzzle pix art style game inspired by Pengo.

Control

Arrow keys for movement(Up, Down, Left, Right), Space bar for pushing cages/shaking the wall.

Team Member

Tezika Zhou: Engineer

Alex Kofford: Engineer

Caitlin McLaughlin: Artist

Sourabhhamigi: Tech Artist

Hope that you can enjoy it.
